Name: Connect-IscsiTarget
Synopsis: Establishes a connection between the local iSCSI initiator and an iSCSI target device.

Name: Disconnect-IscsiTarget
Synopsis: Disconnects sessions to the specified iSCSI target object.

Name: Get-IscsiConnection
Synopsis: Gets information about connected iSCSI initiator connections.

Name: Get-IscsiSession
Synopsis: Retrieves information about established iSCSI sessions.

Name: Get-IscsiTarget
Synopsis: Returns an iSCSI target object for each iSCSI target that is registered with the iSCSI initiator.

Name: Register-IscsiSession
Synopsis: Registers an active iSCSI session to be persistent using the session identifier as input.

Name: Remove-IscsiTargetPortal
Synopsis: Removes the specified iSCSI target portal.

Name: Set-IscsiChapSecret
Synopsis: Sets a CHAP secret key for use with iSCSI initiator connections.

Name: Unregister-IscsiSession
Synopsis: Removes an active iSCSI session from being persistent using the session identifier as input.

Name: Update-IscsiTarget
Synopsis: Refreshes the information about connected iSCSI target objects.

Name: Update-IscsiTargetPortal
Synopsis: Updates information about the specified iSCSI target portal.
